origins.name: 8-bit
origins.desc: Keep score of your team's damage dealt. For each high score you beat, 8-bit champions gain Attack Damage.

origins.name: Country
origins.desc: When your team loses 30% of their Health, a Dreadsteed that empowers your team. Each Country star level increases the Dreadsteed's Health and Attack Damage.

origins.name: EDM
origins.desc:
Use the EDM selector item to choose an EDM champion and see the frequency for each.

At the selected champions's frequency, your EDM champions cast the selected Ability with modified effectiveness.

origins.name: Emo
origins.desc: Emo Champions' Ability cost less Mana to cast, and they gain Mana whenever an allied champion dies.

origins.name: Disco
origins.desc:
Summon a movable Disco Ball.

Combat start: Allies next to it gain Attack Speed and healing immediately and every 3 seconds.

origins.name: Hyperpop
origins.desc: When Hyperpop champions use an Ability, they grant Mana and 4 seconds of Attack Speed to their 2 closest allies.

origins.name: Jazz
origins.desc: For each active trait (except uniques), your team gains bonus Health and deals bonus damage.

origins.name: K/DA
origins.desc: Your team gains max Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage if they are in a lighted hex. K/DA champions gain double!

origins.name: Pentakill
origins.desc:
Pentakill champions reduce incoming damage by 15% and deal bonus damage. For each champion kill, a Pentakill champion rocks out and increases their damage bonus by 25%.

On the 5th kills, all Pentakill champions rock out and your team gains 50% Attack Speed.

origins.name: Heartsteel
origins.desc: Earn Hearts by killing enemies. Gain even more by losing player combat. Every 4 player combats, convert Hearts into powerful rewards!

origins.name: Punk
origins.desc:
Punks gain bonus Health and Attack Damage, which increases by 1% every time you spend gold on a Shop reroll.

After Punks fight in combat, your 1st Shop reroll costs 1 gold and grants 3% bonus instead!

origins.name: True Damage
origins.desc: True Damage champions deal bonus true damage. If they are holding an item, they gain a unique Bling Bonus for their Ability.

classes.name: Bruiser
classes.desc: Your team gains 100 Health. Bruiser gain bonus maximum Health.

classes.name: Crowd Diver
classes.desc:
After Crowd Divers die, they leap onto the furthest enemy, dealing 300 magic damage. Enemies within 1 hex are Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

They also deal bonus damage, increased by 1% each second.

classes.name: Dazzler
classes.desc: Dazzler' Ability reduce their target's damage by 10% and deal bonus magic damage over 2 seconds.

classes.name: Big Shot
classes.desc: Big Shots gain Attack Damage. which increases for 3 seconds when they use their Ability.

classes.name: Edgelord
classes.desc: Edgelords gain Attack Speed which doubles when their target drops target drops below 50% Health. Edgelords with 1-hex range also dash through them on their next attack.

classes.name: Executioner
classes.desc: Executioner Abilities can critically strike and they gain Critical Strike Damage. Their Critical Strike Chance is increased based on their target's missing Health.

classes.name: Mosher
classes.desc:
Moshers gain Attack Speed and Omnivamp, which increases up to 100% based on their missing Health.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

classes.name: Guardian
classes.desc: Once per combat at 50% Health, Guardians shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their max Health.

classes.name: Rapidfire
classes.desc:
Your team gains 10% Attack Speed.

Rapidfire champions gain more on every attack, up to 10 stacks.

classes.name: Sentinel
classes.desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain double.

classes.name: Spellweaver
classes.desc: Your team gains 15 Ability Power. Spellweavers gain more, plus extra Ability Power whenever a Spellweaver casts an Ability.
